cab.content: CONTROL OP V/HOl 3SALB MILK TRADEMemorandum from the Ministry of Food.The scope of the small -Committee v/hich I propose' to appoint will, of course., be far narrower than' that mentionedadvise the Ministry of Food on the-financial arrangements proper to be made with.manufacturers, wholesalers and retailers in connexion with the. scheme of control for milk distribution, Mr, Prothero is suggesting some names, and I have written'to ask Dr. Addisonto nominate a member of his Trusts Committee to serve on my financial Advisory Committee, as it is difficult to sever war causes from post-war effects,, I am.also asking the Chanoellor of the Exchequer to nominate a Chairman.As I stated in my reply to Mr, Protherofs memorandum on this subject, no proposal has been made to purchase any of the businesses affected,, nor is any such proposal in contemplation,,.by Dr. Addison.The Committee, will merely be asked toJ. R... CLYNES,MINISTRY OF FOOD,4th July. 1918,
